ValidationRule.description: Enforces approval limits for Receivables Refunds and Adjustments
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR (TEXT(Department__c ) = 'SRS',TEXT(Department__c ) = 'RSLPO'), TEXT(Approval_Status__c) = 'Approved', OR ( NOT ( OR ($Permission.RSLPO_Sr_Associate, $Permission.RSLPO_Team_Lead, $Permission.RSLPO_Sr_Team_Lead, $Permission.RSLPO_Manager )), AND (Amount_Waived__c > 1000, NOT ( OR ($Permission.RSLPO_Team_Lead, $Permission.RSLPO_Sr_Team_Lead, $Permission.RSLPO_Manager ))), AND (Amount_Waived__c > 25000, NOT ( $Permission.RSLPO_Manager )), Amount_Waived__c > 100000 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to approve this request.
